definitions: (of body tissue or an organ) wasted away or rudimentary

examples.text: in some beetles, the hindwings are atrophied

shortDefinitions: (of body tissue or organ) wasted away or rudimentary

definitions: having lost effectiveness or vigor due to underuse or neglect

examples.text: the atrophied global economy contains numerous areas of chronic weakness

shortDefinitions: having lost effectiveness or vigour due to underuse or neglect
